roleset.name: to oppose or resist

example.name: transitive
example.text: Underwriters insist [0] [these issues]-1 are constructed *-1 [*] to withstand extremely tough economic conditions .

example.name: transitive with adverbials
example.text: `` Basically , we had a severe earthquake of significant duration and it was just [something]-1 [0]-1 the structure could n't withstand [] . ''

roleset.note: WITHSTAND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'withstand' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from withstand.01-v predicate notes)
